page.title: 02Our Family
page.content: There are four people in our family. My Dad and Mum, Mark my brother and myself. My dad is an electrician. He fits in controllers, plug switches, light bulbs and he sometimes wires up houses. He sometimes lets me come with him when he puts light bulbs in flats. My dad also likes fishing and I sometimes go too. My mum has no job apart from typing letters for dad answering buisness phone-calls. I sometimes answer the phone calls too. My brother Mark is 8 years old. He is a bit of a nuisance at times. Like most boys he likes riding his bike. I sometimes play cricket with him. About myself. My name is Nicola, I am 10 years old. I like reading, pop music, maths and roller-skating. Me and my brother leave home to school about 8.50.
